hero-text: We craft full-stack mobile apps in React-Native since 2016, all ready to help you with your next project.
fres-title: Building great projects from the ground up.
fres-text: We develop React-Native mobile apps from the ground up, aligned with industry standards. Sunstack has more than 16 years of experience in the software industry, with the last 7 dedicated to React-Native and React apps.
Our engineers regularly contribute to open-source and maintain some of the most used React-Native packages, cumulating more than 1 million of monthly downloads.
tools-title: Using the finest tools in the industry.
demo-title: Sketch a rough draft and let us handle the rest.
demo-1-text: We elaborate on the technical details with a focus on an initial MVP.
demo-2-text: We draw wireframes to enforce the best UX practices, then setup a prototype.
demo-3-text: We plan ahead all the interactions between services to ensure scalability.
demo-4-text: We create the apps with agility and ensure a testable first draft as early as possible.
demo-5-text: We setup a pipeline to smoothly deploy your app with minimum delay.
demo-6-text: We keep a watch on core health metrics and act upon urgency.
solution-1-text: Amaze your customers with a modern app tailored for your needs. Tell us the story and we'll write the book.
solution-2-text: Just try some ideas and validate some hypothesis about it. The best way to lunch your next startup.
solution-3-text: We dive deeply into your business and provide technical solutions to your problem.
solution-4-text: Invest in your team and grow their skills so they can move faster and break even more things.
solution-5-text: Reinforce your team with our developers to cope with your timely needs.
contact-text: Wether you want to kickstart your next mobile app or have needs in your business, we're always ready for a chat.
contact-privacyPolicy: By sending this form, you accept our privacy policy
name: Nom
